name: XCUICoordinate
desc: A location on screen relative to some UI element.

items.name: var referencedElement: XCUIElement
items.desc: The element that the coordinate is based on, either directly or through the coordinate from which it was derived.

items.name: var screenPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: The dynamically computed value of the coordinateâ€™s location on screen.

items.name: func hover()
items.desc: Moves the pointer to the coordinate.

items.name: func click()
items.desc: Sends a click event at the coordinate.

items.name: func click(forDuration: TimeInterval, thenDragTo: XCUICoordinate)
items.desc: Clicks and holds for a duration you specify, then drags to the other coordinate.

items.name: func click(forDuration: TimeInterval, thenDragTo: XCUICoordinate, withVelocity: XCUIGestureVelocity, thenHoldForDuration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Clicks and holds for a duration you specify, drags at a velocity you specify, and holds over the other coordinate for a duration you specify.

items.name: func doubleClick()
items.desc: Sends a double-click event at the coordinate.

items.name: func rightClick()
items.desc: Sends a Control-click event at the coordinate.

items.name: func scroll(byDeltaX: CGFloat, deltaY: CGFloat)
items.desc: Scrolls the view by the number of x and y pixels you specify.

items.name: func tap()
items.desc: Sends a tap event at the coordinate.

items.name: func doubleTap()
items.desc: Sends a double tap event at the coordinate.

items.name: func press(forDuration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Initiates a press-and-hold gesture at the coordinate, holding for the duration you specify.

items.name: func press(forDuration: TimeInterval, thenDragTo: XCUICoordinate)
items.desc: Initiates a press-and-hold gesture at the coordinate, then drags to another coordinate.

items.name: func press(forDuration: TimeInterval, thenDragTo: XCUICoordinate, withVelocity: XCUIGestureVelocity, thenHoldForDuration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Initiates a press-and-hold gesture, drags to another coordinate with a velocity you specify, and holds for a duration you specify.

items.name: func swipeLeft()
items.desc: Sends a swipe-left gesture.

items.name: func swipeLeft(velocity: XCUIGestureVelocity)
items.desc: Sends a swipe-left gesture with a velocity you specify.

items.name: func swipeRight()
items.desc: Sends a swipe-right gesture.

items.name: func swipeRight(velocity: XCUIGestureVelocity)
items.desc: Sends a swipe-right gesture with a velocity you specify.

items.name: func swipeUp()
items.desc: Sends a swipe-up gesture.

items.name: func swipeUp(velocity: XCUIGestureVelocity)
items.desc: Sends a swipe-up gesture with a velocity you specify.

items.name: func swipeDown()
items.desc: Sends a swipe-down gesture.

items.name: func swipeDown(velocity: XCUIGestureVelocity)
items.desc: Sends a swipe-down gesture with a velocity you specify.

items.name: func withOffset(CGVector) -> XCUICoordinate
items.desc: Creates a new coordinate with an absolute offset in points from the original coordinate.
